import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Listbox, Transition, Switch } from '@headlessui/react' import { CheckIcon, SelectorIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' const tabs = [ { name: 'Create', href: '#', current: true }, { name: 'Read', href: '#', current: false }, { name: 'Update', href: '#', current: false }, { name: 'Delete', href: '#', current: false }, ] const steps = [ { id: 'Step 1', name: 'Job details', href: '#', status: 'current' }, { id: 'Step 2', name: 'Application form', href: '#', status: 'upcoming' }, { id: 'Step 3', name: 'Preview', href: '#', status: 'upcoming' }, ] const sizing = [ { id: 1, type: 'Basic [S, M, L]', value: ['S', 'M', 'L'] }, ] const colours = [ { id: 1, dye: 'Black'}, { id: 2, dye: 'Blue'}, { id: 3, dye: 'Green'}, { id: 4, dye: 'Purple'}, { id: 5, dye: 'Violet'}, { id: 6, dye: 'Indigo'}, { id: 7, dye: 'Pink'}, { id: 8, dye: 'White'}, ] const categories = [ { id: 1, name: 'Blazer'}, { id: 2, name: 'Blouse'}, { id: 3, name: 'Shirt'}, { id: 4, name: 'Bodysuit'}, { id: 5, name: 'Jumpsuit'}, { id: 6, name: 'Playsuit'}, { id: 7, name: 'Romper'}, { id: 8, name: 'Dress'}, { id: 9, name: 'Hoodie'}, { id: 10, name: 'Sweatshirt'}, { id: 11, name: 'Jacket'}, { id: 12, name: 'Leggings'}, { id: 13, name: 'Lingerie'}, { id: 14, name: 'Sets'}, { id: 15, name: 'Shorts'}, { id: 16, name: 'Skirt'}, { id: 17, name: 'Sportswear'}, { id: 18, name: 'Sweater'}, { id: 19, name: 'Swimwear'}, { id: 20, name: 'Trousers'}, { id: 21, name: 'Tops'}, { id: 22, name: 'Underwear'}, ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } const ProductsAdmin = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState(); const submitProduct = () => { console.log('Form submitted!'); } const [selected, setSelected] = useState(sizing[0]) const [colour, setColours] = useState(colours[0]) const [enabled, setEnabled] = useState(false) const [category, setCategory] = useState(categories[7]) return (
{/* Use an "onChange" listener to redirect the user to the selected tab URL. */}
{tabs.map((tab) => ( {tab.name} ))}
    {steps.map((step) => (
  1. {step.status === 'complete' ? ( {step.id} {step.name} ) : step.status === 'current' ? ( {step.id} {step.name} ) : ( {step.id} {step.name} )}
    2. ))}
{/* Product Name Input */}

or drag and drop

PNG, JPG, GIF up to 10MB

{/* Sizing List */} {({ open }) => ( <> Sizing Medium
{selected.type} {sizing.map((size) => ( classNames( active ? 'text-white bg-indigo-600' : 'text-gray-900', 'cursor-default select-none relative py-2 pl-3 pr-9' ) } value={size} > {({ selected, active }) => ( <> {size.type} {selected ? ( ) : null} )} ))}
)} {/* Size Metrics Inputs */} {/* Colour */} {({ open }) => ( <> Product Colour/s {/* Add switch component here */}
{colour.dye} {colours.map((dye) => ( classNames( active ? 'text-white bg-indigo-600' : 'text-gray-900', 'cursor-default select-none relative py-2 pl-3 pr-9' ) } value={dye} > {({ colour, active }) => ( <> {dye.dye} {colour ? ( ) : null} )} ))}
)} {/* Pricing */}
GBP
{/* Delivery Time */} {/* Category */} {({ open }) => ( <> Product Category Use setting
{category.name} {categories.map((cat) => ( classNames( active ? 'text-white bg-indigo-600' : 'text-gray-900', 'cursor-default select-none relative py-2 pl-3 pr-9' ) } value={cat} > {({ category, active }) => ( <> {cat.name} {colour ? ( ) : null} )} ))}
)} {/* Product Features */}
{/* Product Model Number */}
{/* Product Keywords */}
{/* Product Sleeve Length */}
) } export default ProductsAdmin
